text: قَالَ لَا تَخۡتَصِمُواْ لَدَيَّ وَقَدۡ قَدَّمۡتُ إِلَيۡكُم بِٱلۡوَعِيدِ

translation.en: [Allah] will say, "Do not dispute before Me, while I had already presented to you the warning
translation.id: (Allah) berfirman, "Janganlah kamu bertengkar di hadapan-Ku, dan sungguh, dahulu Aku telah memberikan ancaman kepadamu
